descriptionHtml:
[size=4][left]Hello guys, this mod tweaks the skyrim's gameplay, it increases the normal combat and end game potential but nerfs sneaking. It is recommended to play this mod on master/legendary difficulty or rather game will feel so easy.

[size=5]Major changes are[/size] :
1-nerfed sneaking damage mult and shadow warrior (optional)
2-Increased damage and magic resistance cap from 80% to 95% So heavy armor now pays off
3-Dual wielding increases attack speed by 100% but reduces attack damage by 25% at rank 2.
4-Dual magic cast costs x3 but is x3 as powerful.
5-Fixed ciritcal and bleeding damage.
6-Pick pocket chance cap increased to 99%
7-armor perks don't require you to wear helmet

Perk changes :

One handed tree :
Increased one handed armsman perk damage increase to 25%-50%-75%-100%-150%
Dual flurry now grants 50%-100% attack speed but reduces your damage by 15-25%
Maces ignore 30-60-90% of the armor and increase your damage with maces by 30%-60%-90%
Bleeding damage for axes fixed
Swords now have 10-15-20% chance to crit doing 200%-250%-300% times the normal damage
Paralyzing strike changed into One handed mastery perk (increasing your damage with one handed weapons by twice)

Sneak tree :

Sneaking with 2h weapons deal x4 damage
Sneaking with bows deal x2 damage
Sneaking with 1h weapons deal x2
Sneaking with daggers deal x2.5 damage

Backstab now doubles your sneaking damage with 1h weapons
Assassin's blade doubles your sneaking damage with 1h weapons

Dark brotherhood's perk now increases your sneaking damage with all weapons by x1.5

So overall with all perks sneak damage with daggers to x10 damage and with DB gloves it's x15

Shadow warrior perk (optional download) when you crouch in combat you become invisible for 5 seconds (20 seconds cooldown)

Other chances are buffs to light armor heavy armor two handed and block perk trees I will list them later with additional balance changes if this mod gets somehow liked, feel free to make suggestions.[/left][/size]
